lang.title: Language Changed
lang.content_first: We detected that you're in {region}, and the language has been automatically set to @:{'lang.languageName'}. If needed, you can change the language in the footer.
lang.countdown: This notification will close automatically in {countdown} seconds.

support.title: Support DESU.Life
content: The operation of DESU.Life relies on everyone's support
Thank you to all the friends who support DESU.Life
This records all the sponsorships that can be recorded until December 2023.
All sponsorship funds will be used for server, domain name, and various cloud service expenses.
However, due to various reasons, we are no longer accepting new sponsorships.
Despite this, DESU.Life will still move towards the future we all hope for.

footer.topimgCopyRight: The top image is from a random gallery, the copyright belongs to the respective authors
